text: Juan Alcocer Flores (born 10 January 1955) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Guanajuato. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Guanajuato Category:People from Salamanca, Guanajuato Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians Category:Mexican physicians Category:Universidad Autónoma de Guadalajara alumni
title: Juan Alcocer Flores
